BaseballScore

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseballScore.Manager

  • public abstract class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the flow of game using a BaseballScore.Game object; the logic for the game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Game game 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Manager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void ball()
      Handles the game when a ball is called; code for ball element of drawActions() UI;
      protected void batterAdvance()
      Handles when first base is gained on a dropped 3rd strike; code for yes element of drawBatterAdvance() UI with parameter FIRST passed
      abstract void drawActions()
      method called to draw a prompt to select what type of action occurred; strike, ball, hit, base runner change; base runner change should call drawMoveRunner() method
      abstract void drawAddPlayer()
      method should handle collecting and adding players to the team rosters using game.addHomePlayer() and game.addAwayPlayer
      abstract void drawBall()
      method called when less than 4 balls area applied
      abstract void drawBatterAdvance()
      method called to draw a prompt to ask if the batter advanced on a dropped strike three call
      abstract void drawInningEnd()
      method called when 3 outs are applied and the inning been changed
      abstract void drawMoveRunner()
      method called to draw a prompt to move the passed runner to a new base or to be called out
      abstract void drawOut()
      method called when less than 3 outs are applied
      abstract void drawSelectRunner()
      method called to draw a prompt to select a base runner to move; prompt input should call drawRunner() method
      abstract void drawStrike()
      method called when less than 3 strikes are applied
      abstract void drawSubstitution()
      method should handle collecting data and subbing player using game.subHome() and game.subAway()
      protected void hit()
      Handles the game when a hit is called; code for hit element of drawActions() UI;
      protected void moveRunner(Player player, Base base)
      Move a player to a new base; called internally and externally from UI; code for base number elements of drawMoveRunner() UI;
      protected void out(Player player)
      Handles when an out happens; called internally and externally from UI; code for out element of drawMoveRunner() UI with parameter player passed
      protected void strike()
      Handles the game when a strike is called; code for strike element of drawActions() UI;

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Handles when an out happens; called internally and externally from UI; code for out element of drawMoveRunner() UI with parameter player passed
        Parameters:
        player - Player player that is called out

      • moveRunner

        protected void moveRunner(Player player,
                          Base base)
        Move a player to a new base; called internally and externally from UI; code for base number elements of drawMoveRunner() UI;
        Parameters:
        player - Player - the player to move
        base - Base - location to move player param to

      • drawActions

        public abstract void drawActions()
        method called to draw a prompt to select what type of action occurred; strike, ball, hit, base runner change; base runner change should call drawMoveRunner() method

      • drawSelectRunner

        public abstract void drawSelectRunner()
        method called to draw a prompt to select a base runner to move; prompt input should call drawRunner() method

      • drawMoveRunner

        public abstract void drawMoveRunner()
        method called to draw a prompt to move the passed runner to a new base or to be called out

      • drawBatterAdvance

        public abstract void drawBatterAdvance()
        method called to draw a prompt to ask if the batter advanced on a dropped strike three call

      • drawStrike

        public abstract void drawStrike()
        method called when less than 3 strikes are applied

        public abstract void drawInningEnd()
        method called when 3 outs are applied and the inning been changed
